attributes.action: REGULATION TO KEEP SCHOOL EXAMS EQUAL AND FAIR FOR ALL.
attributes.additional_details: WE THE UNDERSIGNED WANT REGULATION IN PLACE TO STOP THE BIAS AND UNFAIR SYSTEM THAT HAS COME ABOUT THIS YEAR 2012, THERE CAN NOT BE A `TWO TIER SYSTEM MAKING THE WHOLE THING A FARCE` AS PROVED BETWEEN APRIL AND AUGUST, THIS MAKES TEACHING HARD WHEN BOUNDARIES ARE CHANGED AT WILL, UNFAIR FOR THE STUDENTS, AND IN MY OPINION A BIG MESS WITH THE EXAM BOARD AND EDUCATION DEPT, KEEP THE GOAL POSTS IN ONE POSITION.
